Spells:
Alarm (W1 Abju): R30' Entry into a 20' cube by a non-designated Tiny or larger creature triggers an audible or mental alarm for 8 hr [R]
Blade Ward (B0 Abju): Self gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing weapon damage for 1 rd
Charm Person (W1 Ench): R30' Target regards self as a friend (save Wisdom neg) for 1 hr or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Feather Fall (W1 Tran): R60' 5 falling targets slow to 60' per rd for 1 min
Knock (W2 Tran): R60' Unlocks, unsticks, or unbars the target or suppresses Arcane Lock for 10 min
Longstrider (W1 Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr [+Level affects +1 target]

Mending (B0 Tran): Touch repairs a break or tear up to 1 ft
Scorching Ray (W2 Evoc): R120' 3 ranged attacks inflict 2d6 HP fire each [+Level gives +1 ranged attack]
Tasha's Hideous Laughter (B1 Ench): R30' Inflicts ROFL (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Web (W2 Conj): R60' 20' cube restrains creatures (save Dexterity neg and Strength frees) for concentration up to 1 hr; burning the web inflicts 2d4 HP fire
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Bard): Knows 2 bard cantrips/Can cast a chosen B1 spell once per long rest
Mage Hand Legerdemain: Can use an invisible Mage Hand to stow and retrieve objects, pick locks, and disarm traps
Magical Ambush: Casting a spell from hiding inflicts disadvantage on the target's initial save
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the wizard spell list
